definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_number_players_world"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">kill all Ice block displays upon loading the world, as long as no-one else is online.</comment><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">kill @e[type=minecraft:block_display,nbt={ForgeData:{freeze_effect:1b}}]</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
